# style

**Instance Property**

The style of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var style: UIBarButtonItem.Style { get set }
```

## Discussion

One of the constants defined in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem/Style-swift.enum]. The default value is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem/Style-swift.enum/plain].

## Customizing item appearance

- **UIBarButtonItem.Style**: Constants that specify the style of an item.
- **tintColor**: The tint color to apply to the button item.
- **isHidden**: A Boolean that determines the visibility of the item.
- **isSelected**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the button is in a selected state.
- **width**: The width of the item.
- **possibleTitles**: The set of possible titles to display on the bar button.
